question: Will New York City crack down on unlicensed weed dispensaries before the end of 2025?

content.text: Right now you can walk down almost any street in Manhattan and find a storefront that is selling weed/marijuana without a license, because currently there are loopholes in the legislation and it is not fully regulated yet.
If they pass legislation to crack down on this or I no longer see these storefronts being operated publicly without worry of legal consequences, I will resolve this YES
